page.title: 17CHURCHES
page.content: { Spixworth church}was built in 1160 and built of stone and flint.At one time the church had a round tower and then it was modernized into a square tower,which was about forty five feet high.The church is dedicated to St.Peter.The church has a weather cock on the tower. { { Crostwick church }square tower which is about fifty feet high.The church itself is made of flint and stone. On top of the church is a weather cock which is made of cast iron.Surounding the church there are gravestones.The church was built around the same time as Spixworths church. From Rackheath there is a clear view of Croswick church from over the corn fields.
